entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning early in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
